name: RetrieveBlogAuthors
description:
Retrieve specified Blog Author objects from the CMS.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about blog authors by specifying their identifiers. This is useful for accessing author details in the HubSpot CMS.

parameters.name: author_identifiers
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the identifiers for the blog authors to retrieve.

parameters.name: include_deleted_authors
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include deleted Blog Authors in the results. Set to true to include them.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
